articles.title: Mi 11 Lite Colour Options Revealed by Xiaomi Ahead of Its India Launch on June 22 - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Mi 11 Lite colour options have been revealed and it will be offered in Jazz Blue, Tuscany Coral, and Vinyl Black. It is set to launch in India on June 22 at 12pm (noon) and will be sold via Flipkart. The phone debuted in the European market along with a 5G va…
articles.content: Mi 11 Lite colour options have been revealed ahead of its June 22 India launch. Xiaomi India took to Twitter to share the three colour options that the phone will launch in. It also shared a short vi… [+2637 chars]

articles.title: Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums after EU car insurance probe - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The European Commission found Insurance Ireland breached EU antitrust rules, effectively restricting competition in the industry.
articles.content:
Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums and refunds if the insurance industry is found to have blocked new players from entering the market.
